description:
HC MongoDB Field Trip

February 23rd, 2018
 

ATTENTION STUDENTS IN THE SCHOOL OF ENGINEERING!

Are you interested in exploring careers in software engineering? Join the Honors College and University Career Services on a trip to MongoDB and network with professionals in software engineering. All majors are welcome on this trip, specifically students in the School of Engineering.


SCHEDULE: Students need to arrive at the Honors College, South (Druskin) Lounge by 10:20AM to check-in; the bus will depart at 10:40AM; the site visit is scheduled from 12:00PM to 3:00PM and includes a welcome by the CEO (a Rutgers alum), tour, information session, panel, and networking. The bus is expected to return to campus around 4:30PM.

RECOMMENDED ATTIRE: Please bring as little as possible with you. We will provide all participants with a pen and portfolio for you to take notes. Acceptable attire for the visit is business casualâ€”no sneakers, t-shirts, shorts, or jeans. (Learn more about business casual at http://careers.rutgers.edu/userfiles/files/Fair_Attire.pdf)

If you have any additional questions, please feel free to email me at nicholas.kobol@rutgers.edu.

Nick Kobol
President, HC Winternship & Field Trip Program
